name: BeyBlade Simulator
description:
Beyblade Simulator
This is a Fan service made Simulation of Beyblade anime in general, This game is  free to play uses original Tv show music themes, SFX and BeyBlade Action!  SO......... Let it RIP!!!!!.................................... Controls W,A,S,D - movement Spacebar - jump V - summon Monster  *This is not a game just a simulation of it I was curious about making a combat simulation of Beyblades in unity, I hope you people enjoy the sim demo have a great day!*
